label: Unit ID number
description: Unique identification number of the institution in the Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System.

label: Number of applicants
description: The number of first-time, degree/certificate-seeking undergraduate students who applied (full or part time) for the most recent fall period available. Includes early decision, early action, and students who began studies during the summer before that fall. This is applicable to institutions that have no open admission policy for entering first-time undergraduate students.

label: Number of admissions
description: The number of first-time, degree/certificate-seeking undergraduate students who were admitted (full or part time) for the most recent fall period available. Includes early decision, early action, and students who began studies during the summer before that fall. This is applicable to institutions that have no open admission policy for entering first-time undergraduate students.

label: Number of students enrolled full-time
description: The number of first-time, degree/certificate-seeking undergraduate students who enrolled full-time for the most recent fall period available. Includes early decision, early action, and students who began studies during the summer before that fall. This is applicable to institutions that have no open admission policy for entering first-time undergraduate students.

label: Number of students enrolled part-time
description: The number of first-time, degree/certificate-seeking undergraduate students who enrolled part-time for the most recent fall period available. Includes early decision, early action, and students who began studies during the summer before that fall. This is applicable to institutions that have no open admission policy for entering first-time undergraduate students.

label: Total number of students enrolled
description: The number of first-time, degree/certificate-seeking undergraduate students who enrolled for the most recent fall period available. Includes early decision, early action, and students who began studies during the summer before that fall. This is applicable to institutions that have no open admission policy for entering first-time undergraduate students.

label: Postsecondary and Title IV institution indicator
Revenue: Tuition and fees, net of discounts and allowances
Revenue: Private gifts, grants, and contracts
Revenue: Total
description: Total revenue includes all revenue, investment return, and other additions.

label: Total student aid
description: Total student aid is total revenue that funds scholarships and fellowships.

label: Expenditures: Research and public service—salaries and wages
Expenditures: Academic and institutional support and student services—total
Expenditures: Academic and institutional support and student services—salaries and wages
Expenditures: Net scholarships and fellowship expenses—total
Expenditures: Net scholarships and fellowship expenses—salaries and wages
Total revenue, investment return, and other additions
Consumer Price Index
description: This inflation index is based on the Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers from the Bureau of Labor Statistics, indexed to 2016.

label: Higher Education Price Index
description: The Higher Education Price Index tracks changes in the prices colleges and universities pay and is based on trends in faculty salaries and price indexes from federal agencies. It is indexed to 2016.

label: Higher Education Cost Adjustment
description: The Higher Education Cost Adjustment is based on the employment cost index (75 percent) and the gross domestic product implicit price deflator (25 percent). It is indexed to 2016.

label: Calculated full-time equivalent enrollment, based on fall enrollment
description: This variable is calculated as the sum of full-time students, plus weighted part-time students by institutional sector as follows:Public four-year and above:Undergraduate: 0.403543Graduate: 0.361702First professional: 0.6Private four-year and above:Undergraduate: 0.392857Graduate: 0.382059First professional: 0.545454Public two-year or less:Undergraduate: 0.335737Private two-year or less:Undergraduate: 0.397058
